author: GamingBolt
description:
Curious about Dying Light: The Beast but worried that the franchise's lore is well beyond your grasp? Perhaps the first two games have been on your backlog of titles and you just never got around to enjoying them? Well, this one's for you! We're diving into the story of the franchise, and take a look at what's potentially on the table in Techland's latest addition to its parkour-based survival horror franchise. 

Kyle Crane and Aiden's adventures feature a lot of twists and turns, and it can be hard to keep up. However, our recap of important events is geared towards letting you learn more about the franchise's past, and hopefully make you more comfortable with experiencing its future.
title: The Full Story of Dying Light So Far - EVERYTHING You Must Know Before Playing Dying Light The Beast

author: GamingBolt
description:
Years after perhaps the most disastrous addition in the series, Battlefield 6 signals a return to form (and a modern setting). Launching on October 10th for Xbox Series X/S, PS5 and PC, it promises everything that fans have wanted and more, including the return of a single-player campaign. 

Let's dive into everything you should know about the sequel before launch.
title: Battlefield 6 - 15 Things You ABSOLUTELY Need To Know Before You Buy
